original_text: At the same time my reason returned to me, and for the glory of my kingdom, my majesty and splendor returned to me. My counselors and my lords sought me, and I was established in my kingdom, and still more greatness was added to me.
korean_text: 그 때에 내 총명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 내 나라의 영광에 대하여도 내 위엄과 광명이 내게로 돌아왔고 또 나의 모사들과 관원들이 내게 찾아오니 내가 내 나라에서 다시 세움을 받고 또 지극한 위세가 내게 더하였느니라

sentences.original_text: At the same time my reason returned to me
and for the glory of my kingdom
my majesty and splendor returned to me.
My counselors and my lords sought me
and I was established in my kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 내 왕국에서 굳건히 세워졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and still more greatness was added to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내게는 여전히 더 큰 위대함이 더해졌습니다
